magicbook.gui.addmedia
Class MediumSpecificQuestionerTool

java.lang.Object
  magicbook.material.Observable
      magicbook.gui.addmedia.MediumSpecificQuestionerTool
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddMusicTool, AddVideoTool
public abstract class MediumSpecificQuestionerTool
extends Observable

This abstract class provides information every "medium specific add-tool" should have, because they will get the set of files and the coverart which were collected by the addmediumtool.

Author:
edzweistein
